metadata.author: Vincent
metadata.description: Representation of the 32 Paths of the Kabbalistic Tree of Life

pageTitle.pageTitleTxt: The Tree of Life (עץ החיים): 32 Paths of Wisdom
pageTitle.tooltipTitleTxt: 10 Sephiroth (divine spheres) and 22 Paths of the Tree of Life, symbolizing the aspects and connections of the universe according to Kabbalah

infinitySymbol.tooltipinfiniSymbolTxt:
∞, Ultimate Source of existence.
The divine Infinity, beyond limits and all understanding

pillars.tooltipPillarLeftTxt: Pillar of severity: justice, strength, discipline, and divine restriction
pillars.tooltipPillarCenterTxt: Pillar of harmony: perfect balance, mediation, divine consciousness, and will
pillars.tooltipPillarRightTxt: Pillar of mercy: compassion, love, clemency, and divine expansion
pillars.pillarLeftDescription: Geburah - The pillar of strength that structures and limits
pillars.pillarCenterDescription: Emtsa - The central pillar that harmonizes and balances
pillars.pillarRightDescription: Hesed - The pillar of love that gives and expands

sephiroth.name: Kether
sephiroth.tooltip: The crown, the divine origin (Supreme Principle)
sephiroth.path: Sekhel Moufla (Extraordinary Consciousness): a transcendent faculty allowing the apprehension of divine mysteries and higher truths

sephiroth.name: Hochmah
sephiroth.path: Sekhel Mazhir (Splendid Consciousness): an inner light that illuminates understanding and reveals the beauty of hidden truths

sephiroth.name: Binah
sephiroth.path: Sekhel Meqoudesh (Sanctified Consciousness): a spiritual purity that elevates the soul and connects to the sacred

sephiroth.name: Hesed
sephiroth.path: Sekhel Kavoua (Permanent Consciousness): a spiritual stability that establishes a lasting and immutable understanding

sephiroth.name: Geburah
sephiroth.path: Sekhel Nishrash (Rooted Consciousness): a deeply rooted wisdom, offering stability and a connection to spiritual foundations

sephiroth.name: Tiphereth
sephiroth.path: Sekhel Shefa Nivdal (Consciousness of Differentiated Influx): a perception that discerns distinct spiritual flows and their unique influences

sephiroth.name: Netsah
sephiroth.path: Sekhel Nisstar (Hidden Consciousness): a veiled wisdom, revealing deep truths through mystery and introspection

sephiroth.name: Hod
sephiroth.path: Sekhel Shalem (Perfect Consciousness): a complete harmony that unifies wisdom and intuition in absolute understanding

sephiroth.name: Yesod
sephiroth.path: Sekhel Tahor (Pure Consciousness): an immaculate clarity that elevates the spirit and perceives spiritual truths without distortion or hindrance

sephiroth.name: Malkuth
sephiroth.path: Sekhel Mitnotsets (Sparkling Consciousness): a vivid and luminous intuition, revealing sparks of spiritual wisdom

connection.description: Kether to Hochmah, representing the divine breath

cineroth.consciousness: Clear consciousness, an absolute clarity that perceives truths without distortion or hindrance
cineroth.cinerMeaning: Represents the divine breath that inspires wisdom

connection.description: Kether to Binah, symbolizing creation

cineroth.consciousness: Clear consciousness, an illuminated perception that discerns the hidden wisdom in creation
cineroth.cinerMeaning: Represents the creation of the universe and matter

connection.description: Kether to Tiphereth, embodying balance

cineroth.consciousness: Unifying consciousness, a deep cohesion that embraces all energies to merge them into absolute harmony
cineroth.cinerMeaning: Symbolizes the balance between cosmic forces

connection.description: Hochmah to Binah, symbolizing the gateway of understanding

cineroth.consciousness: Illuminating consciousness, an inner radiance that reveals hidden wisdom and broadens the soul's perspective
cineroth.cinerMeaning: Symbolizes the transition to a deeper knowledge

connection.description: Hochmah to Tiphereth, representing divine expansion

cineroth.consciousness: Stabilizing consciousness, a subtle balance that supports spiritual evolution and reinforces inner peace
cineroth.cinerMeaning: Embodies the extension of the divine spirit into the universe

connection.description: Hochmah to Hesed, embodying the connection between heaven and earth

cineroth.consciousness: Glorious consciousness, an exaltation of the spirit that celebrates the union of Heaven and Earth in the divine manifestation
cineroth.cinerMeaning: Expresses the union of earthly and divine forces

connection.description: Binah to Tiphereth, symbolizing the struggle for harmony

cineroth.consciousness: Sensitive consciousness, an awakened perception that explores the depth of sensations to achieve inner harmony
cineroth.cinerMeaning: Embodies the quest for inner balance, victory over oneself

connection.description: Binah to Geburah, representing inner strength

cineroth.consciousness: Protective consciousness, a flow of energy that strengthens the spirit and supports discipline in the pursuit of justice
cineroth.cinerMeaning: Symbolizes protection and discipline

connection.description: Hesed to Geburah, embodying the balance between grace and severity

cineroth.consciousness: Inner consciousness, a subtle light that guides the search for truth and nourishes authentic wisdom
cineroth.cinerMeaning: Illustrates the search for spiritual truth

connection.description: Hesed to Tiphereth, symbolizing the path of compassion

cineroth.consciousness: Cyclical consciousness, a deep understanding of the rhythms of life and divine destiny
cineroth.cinerMeaning: Symbolizes the cycles of divine manifestation

connection.description: Hesed to Netsah, embodying the victory of love

cineroth.consciousness: Receptive consciousness, a total openness to divine grace that nourishes the soul and inspires righteous action
cineroth.cinerMeaning: Represents the reception of divine grace

connection.description: Geburah to Tiphereth, symbolizing the balance of forces

cineroth.consciousness: Sacrificial consciousness, a confident surrender that transforms the being and reveals hidden wisdom
cineroth.cinerMeaning: Embodies the sacrifice necessary for spiritual evolution

connection.description: Geburah to Hod, symbolizing purifying water

cineroth.consciousness: Purifying consciousness, a regenerating flow that transforms and renews the being in the depth of its essence
cineroth.cinerMeaning: Embodies purification and change

connection.description: Tiphereth to Netsah, representing continuity

cineroth.consciousness: Imaginative consciousness, an inner vision that embraces the fluidity of life and fosters universal harmony
cineroth.cinerMeaning: Symbolizes fluidity and adaptation

connection.description: Tiphereth to Yesod, embodying support

cineroth.consciousness: Tested consciousness, a lucid state that transcends temptations and supports faith in spiritual ascent
cineroth.cinerMeaning: Highlights challenges to overcome

connection.description: Tiphereth to Hod, symbolizing the divine eye

cineroth.consciousness: Renewed consciousness, a spiritual flash that unveils hidden truths and sparks the awakening of the soul
cineroth.cinerMeaning: Embodies sudden awakening and awareness

connection.description: Netsah to Hod, representing communication

cineroth.consciousness: Expressive consciousness, a deep intimacy with the sacred word that allows communication of the universe's beauty
cineroth.cinerMeaning: Symbolizes expression and sharing

connection.description: Netsah to Yesod, symbolizing fidelity

cineroth.consciousness: Natural consciousness, an intuitive receptivity that embraces the unknown and trusts subtle guidance
cineroth.cinerMeaning: Embodies trust in the unknown

connection.description: Netsah to Malkuth, embodying the cycle of life

cineroth.consciousness: Embodied consciousness, a deep vitality that celebrates the manifestation of the divine in matter and fulfills the cycle of life
cineroth.cinerMeaning: Symbolizes the manifestation of the divine on earth

connection.description: Hod to Yesod, representing humility

cineroth.consciousness: Consciousness of renewal, a global lucidity that awakens inner discernment and leads to the liberation of the spirit
cineroth.cinerMeaning: Embodies inner judgement and rebirth

connection.description: Hod to Malkuth, representing purifying fire

tarot.name: The Fool
tarot.symbolism: Represents unlimited potential and the journey

cineroth.consciousness: Inextinguishable consciousness, a perpetual flame that initiates deep transformation and a new spiritual beginning
cineroth.cinerMeaning: Symbolizes the start of a new spiritual journey

connection.description: Yesod to Malkuth, embodying truth

cineroth.consciousness: Completed consciousness, an ultimate fullness that reveals the fundamental truth of existence and perfect union with the Source
cineroth.cinerMeaning: Embodies final realization and union with the divine
